>>> x= [-4.54853073, -3.12286249, -2.79229594, -2.71130955, -2.7026215,  -2.76645834, \
... -2.86390219, -2.9494606,  -2.98324183, -2.94946124, -2.86390227, -2.76645827, \
... -2.70262161, -2.71130955, -2.79229574, -3.12286283]
>>> x
[-4.54853073, -3.12286249, -2.79229594, -2.71130955, -2.7026215, -2.76645834, -2.86390219, -2.9494606, -2.98324183, -2.94946124, -2.86390227, -2.76645827, -2.70262161, -2.71130955, -2.79229574, -3.12286283]
>>> y=FFT.ifft(x)
>>> y
array([-2.95934967 +0.00000000e+00j, -0.10888861 +2.09690865e-08j,
       -0.18545989 -2.76646600e-08j, -0.11882332 +4.60835605e-08j,
       -0.10153872 -2.31249999e-08j, -0.08949613 +7.04401622e-08j,
       -0.08035629 +7.33533991e-09j, -0.07411416 +1.78256881e-08j,
       -0.07182681 +0.00000000e+00j, -0.07411416 -1.78256881e-08j,
       -0.08035629 -7.33533991e-09j, -0.08949613 -7.04401622e-08j,
       -0.10153872 +2.31249999e-08j, -0.11882332 -4.60835605e-08j,
       -0.18545989 +2.76646600e-08j, -0.10888861 -2.09690865e-08j])
>>> y[9]
(-0.074114160302616167-1.782568813087429e-08j)
>>> y[8]
(-0.071826808750000026+0j)
>>> y[8]=0.0+0.0j
>>> y
array([-2.95934967 +0.00000000e+00j, -0.10888861 +2.09690865e-08j,
       -0.18545989 -2.76646600e-08j, -0.11882332 +4.60835605e-08j,

       -0.18545989 +2.76646600e-08j, -0.10888861 -2.09690865e-08j])
>>> xx = FFT.fft(y)
>>> plt.plot(xx.real)
[<matplotlib.lines.Line2D object at 0x404aa90>]
>>> plt.show()
